headline: KeyBanc Lowers Expand Energy (EXE) PT to $127 Due to Revised Natural Gas Price Forecast
summary: Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:EXE) is one of the best inexpensive stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On September 3, KeyBanc lowered the firm’s price target on Expand Energy to $127 from $135, while maintaining an Overweight rating on the shares. The firm says its updated estimates reflect KeyBanc’s revised natural gas price forecast. In […]
